sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>white</radical> <radical>ice</radical> <radical>tree</radical> is a magical tree. When you eat its ice flowers it gives you incredible amounts of <kanji>comfort</kanji>, <kanji>ease</kanji>, and <kanji>pleasure</kanji>.
meaningInfo: Imagine yourself picking the white ice flowers off the tree. Then, put it in your mouth. Make it taste comforting... It puts you at ease. Then, swallow it. Feel your head go nuts with comfort. This is the greatest drug in the world when it comes to comfort. So much pleasure!
readingMnemonic: You want more of this. You gather as much as you can, and create an entire <reading>rack</reading> (<ja>らく</ja>) at your store with this tree. You sell out immediately, and have to refill your rack.
readingInfo: Imagine setting up the rack. Make it look beautiful. Shift around the flowers. Fill up the entire rack. Of course, your focus should be on the rack portion.
